resources.string: External storage is not available, Please turn off USB storage.
Failed to load the native LK8000 library.\nReport this problem to us, and include the following information:\n

LK8000 is moving your data (%1$d MB) from the directory LK8000/ to Android/data/%2$s/files/. \nThis is required by Google as part of an effort to improve your privacy. \nPlease wait, the migration can take a few minutes.
